explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting with white walls, a man in a red short-sleeved shirt sits on the left side of a white table, looking straight ahead with his hands resting below the table. There's a small purple jar and two white plates on the table, each with a hamburger. A woman in a light blue short-sleeved shirt and blue pants stands behind him by a black sink, looking at her phone. A white mug with black patterns and some cleaning supplies rest on the counter. Above is a gray wood grain cabinet.

[0-10] The man glances at the woman, picks up and opens the small purple jar on the table. Using his left hand to hold the top bun of the right hamburger, he sprinkles a pile of white powder onto the cheese with his right hand holding the jar. At this moment, the woman behind him is holding the mug in her left hand and her phone in her right, watching his actions with a surprised expression. After pouring the powder, the man closes the jar, smiles at the camera revealing his white teeth, and puts the jar back on the table. The woman regains her composure, turns her head, and slowly approaches the table. The man looks back at her, and after a brief eye contact, the woman begins to speak. While talking, she hands her phone to the man and slowly sits down in front of the table, placing the mug on it. The man smiles, looking at the phone.
